00038 class SIM_API cHistogramBase : public cDensityEstBase
00039 {
00040   protected:
00041     int num_cells;        // nr. of categories
00042     unsigned *cellv;      // array of counters
00043 
00044   protected:
00045     // abstract method in cDensityEstBase
00046     virtual void doMergeCellValues(const cDensityEstBase *other);
00047 
00048   public:
00051 
00055     cHistogramBase(const cHistogramBase& r) : cDensityEstBase(r)
00056         {setName(r.getName());cellv=NULL;operator=(r);}
00057 
00061     cHistogramBase(const char *name, int numcells);
00062 
00066     virtual ~cHistogramBase();
00067 
00071     cHistogramBase& operator=(const cHistogramBase& res);
00073 
00076 
00077     /* No dup() because this is an abstract class. */
00078 
00084     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00085 
00091     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00093 
00096 
00100     virtual void clearResult();
00101 
00106     virtual void transform();
00107 
00111     virtual int getNumCells() const;
00112 
00116     virtual void saveToFile(FILE *) const;
00117 
00121     virtual void loadFromFile(FILE *);
00123 
00130     virtual void setNumCells(int numcells);
00132 };

00141 class SIM_API cEqdHistogramBase : public cHistogramBase
00142 {
00143   protected:
00144     double cellsize;  // cell/category sizes; <=0 if unset
00145 
00146   public:
00149 
00153     cEqdHistogramBase(const cEqdHistogramBase& r) : cHistogramBase(r)
00154         {setName(r.getName());operator=(r);}
00155 
00159     explicit cEqdHistogramBase(const char *name=NULL, int numcells=-1);
00160 
00164     cEqdHistogramBase& operator=(const cEqdHistogramBase& res);
00166 
00169 
00170     /* No dup() because this is an abstract class. */
00171 
00177     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00178 
00184     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00186 
00187   protected:
00192     virtual void collectTransformed(double value);
00193 
00198     virtual void setupRange();
00199 
00200   public:
00203 
00207     virtual double getBasepoint(int k) const;
00208 
00212     virtual double getCellValue(int k) const;
00213 
00217     virtual double getPDF(double x) const;
00218 
00222     virtual double getCDF(double x) const;
00223 
00227     virtual void saveToFile(FILE *) const;
00228 
00232     virtual void loadFromFile(FILE *);
00234 
00241     virtual void setCellSize(double d);
00242 
00247     virtual double getCellSize() const {return cellsize;}
00249 
00250 };

00319 class SIM_API cLongHistogram : public cEqdHistogramBase
00320 {
00321   protected:
00322     virtual void getAttributesToRecord(opp_string_map& attributes);
00323 
00324   public:
00327 
00331     cLongHistogram(const cLongHistogram& r) : cEqdHistogramBase(r)
00332         {setName(r.getName());operator=(r);}
00333 
00337     explicit cLongHistogram(const char *name=NULL, int numcells=-1);
00338 
00342     virtual ~cLongHistogram();
00343 
00347     cLongHistogram& operator=(const cLongHistogram&)  {copyNotSupported();return *this;}
00349 
00352 
00357     virtual cLongHistogram *dup() const  {return new cLongHistogram(*this);}
00359 
00360   protected:
00365     virtual void setupRange();
00366 
00367   public:
00370 
00375     virtual void collect(double value);
00376 
00380     virtual void collect(SimTime value) {collect(value.dbl());}
00381 
00388     virtual double random() const;
00390 };

00454   public:
00457

00463 
00467     explicit cDoubleHistogram(const char *name=NULL, int numcells=-1);
00468

00477     cDoubleHistogram& operator=(const cDoubleHistogram&)  {copyNotSupported();return *this;}
00479
